product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Spark Force Firestarter
long_description: Small enough to stow in your pocket during backcountry sojurns, the Ultimate Survival Technologies Spark Force Firestarter lets you start a campfire even in adverse conditions. Pulling the striker down the flint bar emits sparks to light stove, paper, dry grass, bark or other tinder. Fireproof in solid form, it works in wet, windy conditions and at any altitude. Includes handle, striker, fire-starter rod and cord to keep striker and starter together.
short_description: Small enough to stow in your pocket during backcountry sojurns, the Ultimate Survival Technologies Spark Force Firestarter lets you start a campfire even in adverse conditions.
